rule.name: CUST_addOverseasAddressDetails
rule.description: This rule is used to display add tradinf entity overseas address details.
rule.definition: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Address", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", validations: #"_a-0000dada-365c-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_22899"( fieldMaxLength: #"_a-0000dada-365c-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_22921", fieldData: ri!addressValue1 ), value: ri!addressValue1, saveInto: ri!addressValue1, required: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( labelPosition: "ADJACENT", validations: #"_a-0000dada-365c-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_22899"( fieldMaxLength: #"_a-0000dada-365c-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_22920", fieldData: ri!addressValue2 ), value: ri!addressValue2, saveInto: ri!addressValue2 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( labelPosition: "ADJACENT", validations: #"_a-0000dada-365c-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_22899"( fieldMaxLength: #"_a-0000dada-365c-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_22922", fieldData: ri!addressValue3 ), value: ri!addressValue3, saveInto: ri!addressValue3 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField"( label: "Country", labelPosition: "ADJACENT", validations: #"_a-0000dada-365c-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_22899"( fieldMaxLength: #"_a-0000dada-365c-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_22923", fieldData: ri!country ), choiceLabels: { #"_a-0000da0f-2564-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_5819" }, placeholderLabel: #"_a-0000da0f-2564-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_5141", choiceValues: { #"_a-0000da0f-2564-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_5816" }, value: ri!country, saveInto: ri!country, required: true ) }
